New Records: Zach Edey shattered rookie records, becoming the first rookie with a 20/10 game, shooting at least 90% from the floor.
Key Match Events: Zach Edey had a career-high 25 points, 12 rebounds, and 4 blocks.
Dennis Schroder finished with 20 points and six assists, shooting 7 of 15, including 2 of 7 from 3-point range.
Ja Morant contributed 25 points and nine assists on 10 of 22 shooting.
Post-Match Reflections: Zach Edey's performance can give the team some confidence as the Grizzlies look to bounce back and string a lengthy winning stretch together over the coming weeks.
